channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly news - December 2025
item.description:
Microsoft DefenderMonthly news - December 2025 Edition This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month across our Defender products. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from October 2025. Defender for Cloud has its own Monthly News post, have a look at their blog space. 😎 Microsoft Ignite 2025 - now on-demand! 🚀 New Virtual Ninja Show episode:
Advancements in Attack Disruption Vulnerability Remediation Agent in Microsoft Intune
Microsoft Defender
Ignite 2025: What's new in Microsoft Defender? T...
